Event.name: Fugitive
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Fugitive</fen> avoids recapture by or on the authority of <fen>Authorities</fen> in relation to a <fen>Crime</fen> which the <fen>Fugitive</fen> has committed or is suspected of having committed.
<ex><fex name="fug">He</fex> <m>is</m> in fact a <t>fugitive</t> <fex name="aut">of the law</fex> and you must inform the police if you see him.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Time">Only two years earlier</fex> <fex name="fug">she</fex> had <m>been</m> <t>on the lam</t> <fex name="Crime">from charges of embezzlement</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Fugitive
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Fugitive</fen> has escaped and/or is evading capture by law enforcement <fen>Authorities</fen>.
<ex>Only two years earlier <fex name="fug">she</fex> had <m>been</m> <t>on the lam</t> from charges of embezzlement.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Prison
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The facility where the <fen>Fugitive</fen> was being held.
<ex>Police are still searching for three <t>fugitives</t> <fex name="prison">from Colorado State Prison</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Authorities
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Authorities</fen> want to take (or retake) the <fen>Fugitive</fen> into custody on suspicion of having committed a <fen>Crime</fen>.
<ex><t>Fugitives</t> <fex name="aut">from the law</fex> will have the opportunity to present their cases.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Crime
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The crime of which the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is wanted. This FE also covers expressions that indicate suspicion of crimes, convictions, and sentences.
<ex>A local woman <t>on the lam</t> <fex name="cri">from a ten-year prison sentence.</fex></ex>
<ex>US Officials recently arrested over a dozen <fex name="cri">drug</fex> <t>fugitives</t> in a bust that has been planned for months.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the general <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is located.
<ex>Sloan, <t>on the lam</t> <fex name="pla">in Michigan</fex> for the last five months, is due to appear in court this Monday.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is evading law enforcement.
<ex>He was a <t>fugitive</t> <fex name="Time">in the early 1990s</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the state of being imprisoned which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously), force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way).</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is avoiding capture.
<ex>I'm <t>on the lam</t> <fex name="Explanation">because that's the only way I'll be able to prove my innocense</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Duration</fen> of time for which the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is on the run.
<ex>The <fex name="Dur">30-year</fex> <t>fugitive</t> was stunned when authorities knocked on his door last May.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: fugitive.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person on the run from law enforcement.

lexUnit.name: on the run.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: evading capture from law enforcement.
